item.title: Praise from Ariel Dorfman
item.description: Quote from Dorfman himself: “I purloin the phrase from Sophia McClennen, my most astute critic, thus far, who has written extensively about my work, most notably in a new book, Ariel Dorfman: An Aesthetics of Hope.” Art Bulletin, march 2009. Volume XCI, no. 1, p 58.
